"The Amazing Spider-Man" tells the story of Peter Parker (Andrew Garfield), a shy high school student who discovers he has incredible spider-like powers. To protect his identity, Peter uses the alias "Spider-Man".

Peter learns about his parents, who were both killed in an accident while Peter was just a baby. Peter's adoptive father, Ben Parker (Tim Tevison)), works as a police officer and tries to raise Spider-Man as his own son.

Peter discovers that his true identity is still unknown to the rest of the world. Peter learns from Ben Parker (Tim Tevison)) that the man who killed his parents was actually another man named "Harry" (John Mulaney)).
